alert.note: Alert for Brevard; Indian River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 16 at 9:07PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Brevard and Indian River. * WHEN...Until 1045 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Some roads are impassable due to flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 907 PM EST, trained weather spotters reported heavy rain in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring. Between 4 and 11 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Palm Bay, Fellsmere and Malabar. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
